short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy quick and easy access to your favorite Google services - whether it's Gmail, YouTube, or News, Quickle has got you covered.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸ™Œ Enjoy quick and easy access to your favorite Google services.

With Quickle, all it takes it two clicks to check your e-mail, read the news, or even watch YouTube. With a clean interface containing links to Google Mail, Drive, News, Docs, and more, Quickle is designed to make the Google services you love easier to access.

âž¤ As of 2022, you can now start a Google search directly through Quickle. All you need to do is select the Google icon on the navbar, and you will see a fully-functional Google search bar!

âž¤ Quickle is easy to use. Once you've installed the extension, it will appear next to Chrome's search bar, where it is easy to access. All you have to do to launch the extension is click on it. Once the extension is open, you will see various Google services, which you can click on to launch them. If you wish to search Google directly from Quickle, you can select the black Google icon, and a search bar will appear you can use to browse the web.

Learn more about Quickle at https://github.com/gaberf/Quickle
